meanings.definition: An upland area or stretch of moorland.
meanings.sent1: The sheep grazed peacefully on the wold.
meanings.sent2: The hikers enjoyed the scenic views from the wold.
meanings.sent3: The wold seemed to whisper secrets to the passing clouds.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the wold turned into a golden sea of grass.
meanings.sent5: The wold was a vast expanse of tranquility under the endless sky.

meanings.definition: A piece of high, open, uncultivated land or moor.
meanings.sent1: The wind swept across the wold, carrying the scent of heather.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted the beauty of the wold in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: Lost in the wold, they stumbled upon a hidden stream.
meanings.sent4: The wold was a rugged canvas waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The wold stretched out like a sleeping giant under the moonlight.
